summary: This document is an email chain from April 29, 2020, forwarding a whistleblower complaint from an employee at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York. The complaint alleges misconduct by MCC management, including Warden Vitale, related to inmate mistreatment during a lockdown and nepotism. The Office of the Inspector General (OIG) is sharing this information with the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USAO-SDNY) due to potential relevance to the Epstein matter and lockdown investigations.
